author: stashev
body:
library/powershell does not exist
seems right command will be: docker run -it lalyos/powershell

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi **@stasburn**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: garethr
comments.body: Worth noting that `laylos/powershell` is built from a fork, not this repo. It would be useful to setup an official build under the Microsoft namespace as a trusted build from this repository.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: The instructions have been updated to explicitly call out the build step to create the Docker container. Thanks for the contribution!

title: Update docker.md
